unnormalised: Payment gateways, the unsung heroes of my late-night biryani cravings! Seriously, remember that time the server was down during Diwali? Chaos! If my UPI fails one more time, I'm blaming it on my Shani. Choosing the right one is like finding a good auto-wallah in Bangalore, rare & precious. My grandmother says even her 1950s post office was more reliable some days!
normalised: Payment gateways, the unsung heroes of my late-night biryani cravings! Seriously, remember that time the server was down during Diwali? Chaos!
